Posts.Content: Hi guys i am new to this forum. I am about 28 days post surgery. I am getting through nights with just pads very little leakage. Mornings are ok but afternoons i struggle it almost like someone flicks a switch at 12:30 and i start to really have leakages when i move. Am walking in afternoons for 45mins which is uncomfortable but i want to maintain fitness. I find i suffer burning pain in my penis during these walks with leakage even with an empty bladder. I am just over a UTI be alert to pain when passing urine and act quickly if you feel it. My frustration is that i dont seem to have seen any improvement in my incontinence over the last ten days. Peter
Posts.Signature: 58yo Underwent Robotic Radical Prostatectomy 12 nov 2014 Psa 12 first test aug 2014 Biopsy 1st sept 17 cores i dont have that report Post op pathology Gleeson 4 + 3 tumor volume 2.6cc Stage 111 Cancer present in right centre and right apex Margins clear perineural invasion present lymph nodes clear bladder neck not involved seminal vessels not involved.
Posts.Title: Surgery behind me now
